mapper.update: update borrow set borrowTime = #{borrowtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, borrowMoney = #{borrowmoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, borrowInterest = #{borrowinterest,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, borrowTypesId = #{borrowtypesid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where borrowId = #{borrowid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select borrowId, borrowTime, borrowMoney, borrowInterest, userId, borrowTypesId from borrow
